name: Escort Bull Tac 12ga 18 Shotgun 5+1
summary: The Hatsan Arms Company of Turkey introduces the Escort Bull Tac pump-action shotgun, a bull-pup design available in 12, 20 and .410 gauge, designed to compete with some well-known US-made models

name: Beretta 21A Bobcat Flat
summary: The Beretta 21A Bobcat is a unique, diminutive firearm featuring a tip-up barrel design that makes for a reliable EDC or back-up pistol when carrying a full-sized handgun is impractical.

name: Rossi SS Brawler .410
summary: The new Brawler is a single shot .45 Colt/.410 pistol reminiscent of the Thompson Contender. Itâ€™s a big, simple, break open design with an exposed hammer and single action mechanism.

name: CZ 457 Varmint MTR .22 LR 20.5' Turkish Walnut
summary: The 457 Match Target Rifle's match chamber is cut to the tightest specification that CIP will allow, meaning it will perform impressively well with top-tier ammo.
